titleStmt.title: An abstract of the laws in force against forestallers, regrators, ingrossers, exporters, or transporters of corn commanded to be put in speedy and vigorous execution by the Lords justices late proclamation and their excellencies new order in council requiring all justices of the peace ... to use their utmost care and diligence that the said proclamation be duly observed ...
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Chetham's Library.
